analysis.description:
TIX.canIssue (/unique_chucks/8/0x1acf991d7ced97b558c7a87f4bd7afd75e15fcb7.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- start_time == 0 || end_time <= now

TIX.canIssue (/unique_chucks/8/0x1acf991d7ced97b558c7a87f4bd7afd75e15fcb7.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- start_time == 0 || end_time <= now
TIX.start (/unique_chucks/8/0x1acf991d7ced97b558c7a87f4bd7afd75e15fcb7.sol#339-359) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(start_time == 0)

TIX.minimum should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0x1acf991d7ced97b558c7a87f4bd7afd75e15fcb7.sol#184-185)
